availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: C. T. Sandefur (Henderson County, Kentucky, merchant and tailor)

body.p: Henderson County, Kentucky, merchant and tailor. Kentucky native. Married to Eliza Jane Walker Sandefur in Indiana on December 29, 1832. Father of William A. Sandefur, Mary E. Sandefur, B.F. Sandefur, M.C. Sandefur, James F. Sandefur, E.O. Sandefur, Bud Sandefur, E.J. Sandefur, Tandy N. Sandefur, Henry C. Sandefur, Eva Sandefur, and Eugene Sandefur. Merchant and tailor in Henderson County, Kentucky in 1860. Owned one enslaved individual in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henderson County, Division 1, p. 50.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Henderson County, Division 1, p. 18.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henderson County, Henderson, p. 78A.
Indiana, Marriages, 1810-2001,Salt Lake City, Utah: FamilySearch, 2013, Film Number 001310439.
